mapper.sql:
where status != '-1'
and ( scs like '%${keyword}%' or cpmc like '%${keyword}%' or cpbh like '%${keyword}%' or qyxxm like '%${keyword}%' or hzcl like '%${keyword}%' or xkqx like '%${keyword}%')
and scs like '%${scs}%'
and cpmc like '%${cpmc}%'
and cpbh like '%${cpbh}%'
and qyxxm like '%${qyxxm}%'
and hzcl like '%${hzcl}%'
and mj like '%${mj}%'
and xkqx like '%${xkqx}%'
and status = #{status}
mapper.select: select id,scs,cpmc,cpbh,qyxxm,hzcl,mj,xkqx,bz,addTime,status from dz_lsspzs where status != '-1' order by id desc
select id,scs,cpmc,cpbh,qyxxm,hzcl,mj,xkqx,bz,addTime,status from dz_lsspzs order by ${orderby} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into dz_lsspzs( id, scs, cpmc, cpbh, qyxxm, hzcl, mj, xkqx, bz, addTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{scs}, #{cpmc}, #{cpbh}, #{qyxxm}, #{hzcl}, #{mj}, #{xkqx}, #{bz}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_lsspzs set scs=#{scs}, cpmc=#{cpmc}, cpbh=#{cpbh}, qyxxm=#{qyxxm}, hzcl=#{hzcl}, mj=#{mj}, xkqx=#{xkqx}, bz=#{bz}, addTime=#{addTime}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update dz_lsspzs set status = #{status} where id in (${ids})
update dz_lsspzs set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
